sentences.english: Objective To discuss the surgical treatment of unstable scapular fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肩胛骨不穩定骨折的手術治療。

sentences.english: Firm the shoulder blades against the back, and move the sternum toward the chin.
sentences.chinese: 固定肩胛骨進入背部，移動胸骨向下巴的方向。

sentences.english: But some of the features from the upper part of the body, including the shoulder blade(17) and arms are more ape-like.
sentences.chinese: 但上半身的一些特徵，包括肩胛骨和胳膊更象猿。

sentences.english: The upper arm meets the shoulder blade at approximately a right angle.
sentences.chinese: 上臂和肩胛骨交接處形成一個直角。

sentences.english: Now lean back against the firmness of the tail bone and shoulder blades.
sentences.chinese: 在保持尾骨和肩胛骨穩定的前提下，向後屈身。

sentences.english: The breastplate that the data that augur place uses basically is chelonian the bladebone with the ox.
sentences.chinese: 占卜所用的材料主要是龜的腹甲和牛的肩胛骨。

sentences.english: Do not tense your shoulders as you do this.
sentences.chinese: 當你做這個動作時，不要收緊肩胛骨。

sentences.english: Internal rotation is accompanied by scapular retraction and associated clavicular movements.
sentences.chinese: 內旋轉會伴有肩胛骨回縮及相關的鎖骨運動。

sentences.english: Shoulder blade and upper arm are moderately anuglated and approximately equal in length.
sentences.chinese: 肩胛骨和上臂骨之間的角度適中，且長度幾乎相等。

sentences.english: On the exhale return to the starting position, pulling your shoulder blades down the back.
sentences.chinese: 呼氣，還原到起始姿勢，拉兩肩胛骨平展。

sentences.english: Press your shoulders down and push your scapulae together. Release and repeat 15 times.
sentences.chinese: 放下肩膀收緊肩胛骨，如此重複15次。

sentences.english: Shoulder blades long, wide, sloping well back, fairly close together at the withers.
sentences.chinese: 肩胛骨長，寬，向後傾斜，在馬肩隆處非常靠近。

sentences.english: Both shoulder blades and upper arm are long, permitting depth of chest at the brisket.
sentences.chinese: 肩胛骨和前臂骨都足夠長，給予胸部足夠的深度。

sentences.english: The part of a forequarter from the neck to the ribs and including the shoulder blade.
sentences.chinese: 從脖子到肋骨之間的包括肩胛骨在內的前半部分。

sentences.english: Put your fingers together and make your palm face to the top inside of your partner's godet.
sentences.chinese: 手指併攏把掌側放在肩胛骨頂部的內側。

sentences.english: The surgeon reset her broken shoulder blade.
sentences.chinese: 外科醫生把她摔斷的肩胛骨重新接好。

definition: serratus anterior muscle (upper sides of the chest)
trapezius muscle (of the upper back and neck)
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
